column2: Jadis, the White Witch, the Current Queen of Narnia. She has ruled with tyranny for the past 100 years, making it always winter and never Christmas. but the populous, discontent as they are, have gathered behind a young human. and rumors that aslan has returned to support the traitor may be dangerous to Charnian Rule
Miraz has ruled Telmarine Narnia since the death of his brother, the last king. but when his son is born his nephew Caspian fled the capital to lead a revolt against the rightful King

Caspian fled Castle Caspian when his uncle King Miraz tried to murder him like his father, fleeing into the forest Caspian finds old narnia and taking the Mantle of King, Caspian vows to reunite all of Narnia

King Lune is in a precarious position, trapped between Jadis to the north and the Calormen Empire to the south, Great Stratergy will be required to survive. but there may be hope with a rebellion taking place in Narnia...
The Calormen Empire is in a very avantagious posistion
